body.p:
Mt Washington Ky
Bulitt Co July the 6th 1861
Hon Beriah Magoffin
Gov of Kentucky
Dear Sir

at our last April Term of Circuit Court Preston Trustman Was fined Three Hundred Dollars Which fine he Begs your Honor Will Remit He Was not presant at the Trial on account of the Sickness of His Wife He Lives in Davis County Some 100 Miles from our Place He is an Honest Hard Working Industriss Poor Man and Wholy unable to Pay the fine Without Great sacrifice to Himself and family He was Tried With others for the Same offence Who Was clared Circumstances proves Them Moore Gilty Than Himself,

Yours Truly
J. C. Dent P. J. B. C
